internal.content:
---
title: Upgrade Prerequisites
---           

Maximo required to be at version 7612 or higher prior to MAS upgrade.

[Plan and Prepare your environment](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/mas84/8.4.0?topic=planning-installation)
- Refer to MAS and Manage documentation, determine the capacity needed and secure an OpenShift cluster for testing or development or production.
	- Maximo Application Suite link: [MAS](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/mas84/8.4.0?topic=installing)
	- Capacity Planning link: [Capacity Planning](https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6410878#capacity_planning_alt).

Configure OpenShift cluster based on the above requirements.
